headline: European Commission Grants Conditional Approval of EZMEKLY® (mirdametinib) for the Treatment of Adult and Pediatric Patients with NF1-PN
summary: – EZMEKLY is the first and only therapy to receive marketing authorization in the EU for both adults and children (≥2 years) with NF1-PN, a rare genetic disorder with debilitating symptoms –STAMFORD, Conn., July 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- SpringWorks Therapeutics, Inc., a healthcare company of Merck, announced today that the European Commission (EC) granted conditional marketing authorization for EZMEKLY® (mirdametinib) for the treatment of symptomatic, inoperable plexiform neurofibromas (PN)
